location.name: Colosseum
location.description: Monumental 3-tiered Roman amphitheater once used for gladiatorial games, with guided tour option.

location.name: Amalfi Coast
location.description: UNESCO-listed landscape lined with small towns precariously perched between mountains & the sea.

location.name: Florence Cathedral
location.description: Landmark 1200s cathedral known for its red-tiled dome, colored marble facade & elegant Giotto tower.
